mapper.select: SELECT c.CMTNUM, c.REGDATE, u.IMG, c.UNUM ,u.NAME, c.CRSNUM, c.RATE, c.PARENT, c.context FROM COMMENT c, USER u WHERE c.UNUM = u.UNUM order by REGDATE DESC;
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM COMMENT WHERE CMTNUM = #{cmtNum} OR PARENT = #{parent};
mapper.select: SELECT c.CRSNUM, u.NAME, c.TITLE AS crsTitle, c.DSCRT AS crsDscrt, c.MATERIAL, c.IMGPATH AS img, c.SEQ1 AS seq1Num, c.SEQ2 AS seq2Num, c.SEQ3 AS seq3Num, c.SEQ4 AS seq4Num, c.SEQ5 AS seq5Num, c.SEQ6 AS seq6Num, c.SEQ7 AS seq7Num, c.SEQ8 AS seq8Num FROM COURSE c, USER u WHERE c.UNUM = u.UNUM;

SELECT c.CRSNUM, u.NAME, c.UNUM, c.TITLE AS crsTitle, c.DSCRT AS crsDscrt, c.MATERIAL, c.IMGPATH AS img, c.SEQ1 AS seq1Num, c.SEQ2 AS seq2Num, c.SEQ3 AS seq3Num, c.SEQ4 AS seq4Num, c.SEQ5 AS seq5Num, c.SEQ6 AS seq6Num, c.SEQ7 AS seq7Num, c.SEQ8 AS seq8Num FROM COURSE c, USER u WHERE c.UNUM = u.UNUM AND c.CRSNUM = #{crsNum};
mapper.update: UPDATE COURSE SET TITLE = #{crsTitle}, DSCRT = #{crsDscrt}, MATERIAL = #{material}, SEQ1 = #{seq1Num}, SEQ2 = #{seq2Num}, SEQ3 = #{seq3Num}, SEQ4 = #{seq4Num}, SEQ5 = #{seq5Num}, SEQ6 = #{seq6Num}, SEQ7 = #{seq7Num}, SEQ8 = #{seq8Num} WHERE CRSNUM = #{crsNum};
